entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 6 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

SNOW
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 3 TO 5 INCHES
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 14
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

SNOW LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 3 TO 5 INCHES
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 12
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

SNOW
NEW MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 14
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 2 BELOW

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND ZERO
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

MOSTLY SUNNY
COLD WITH HIGHS 10 TO 15
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 10 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO
